survey_name: AI-Powered Personal Fitness Trainer Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of AI-powered personal fitness trainers to evaluate satisfaction levels, feature usability, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use your AI-powered personal fitness trainer?
questions.client_notes: Ensure the options cover a broad range of usage frequencies to capture accurate data.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use your AI-powered personal fitness trainer?

questions.question_text: Which features of the AI-powered personal fitness trainer do you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: All respondents except those who answered 'Not currently using' in Q1
questions.client_notes: This question helps identify which features are most appreciated by users.
